meanings.definition: A person who believes in or practices amorality.
meanings.sent1: The amoralists in the group argued that ethics were not important.
meanings.sent2: The amoralists in the debate club had a different perspective on right and wrong.
meanings.sent3: The amoralists at the party joked about not having a moral compass.
meanings.sent4: In the world of fiction, the villains were portrayed as amoralists without conscience.
meanings.sent5: The amoralists in the story made decisions solely based on personal gain.
